Ino runs forward to the opponent and then disappears in a curtain of purple petals. She appears behind the opponent and concentrates [[chakra]] into a rope of petals, then kicks the opponent and throws a [[kunai]] attached to an [[explosive tag]] at them.

== Trivia ==
* This technique replaces [[Petal Diversion: Chakra Rope]] when Ino's health bar is low.

[[es:Distracción de Pétalos: Fuegos Artificiales Floreados]]
[[pl:Dywersja Płatków: Kwiatowe Fajerwerki]]
